test.name: Prefixed name with prefix and local-name
Updates
Terms
Patterns
Expressions
test.sparql:
PREFIX : <u:>
ASK WHERE { FILTER (1 * (1 + 1)) . FILTER (: || :) . FILTER (: && :) . FILTER (: IN (:)) . FILTER (: NOT IN (:)) . FILTER :(:) . FILTER :(DISTINCT :) . FILTER (: = :) . FILTER (: != :) . FILTER (: < :) . FILTER (: > :) . FILTER (: <= :) . FILTER (: >= :) . FILTER (: + :) . FILTER (: - :) . FILTER (: * :) . FILTER (: / :) . FILTER (!:) . FILTER BNODE() . FILTER STR(:) . FILTER LANGMATCHES(:, :) . FILTER REGEX(:, :, :) . FILTER LANGMATCHES(:, :) . FILTER REGEX(:, :, :) . FILTER REPLACE(:, :, :, :) . FILTER BOUND(?s) . FILTER CONCAT(:) . FILTER SUM(:) . FILTER SUM(DISTINCT :) . FILTER COUNT(:) . FILTER COUNT(DISTINCT *) . FILTER GROUP_CONCAT(:; SEPARATOR = ' ') . FILTER GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT :; SEPARATOR = 'x') . FILTER EXISTS { } . FILTER NOT EXISTS { } }

test.name: Select
